script: There is a Library in the center of my hometown.
I visited Retail Area, which is 4 KM, West from Library.
I visited Hospital, which is 4 KM, South from Retail Area.
I visited Museum, which is 3 KM, East from Hospital.
I visited Playground, which is 2 KM, East from Museum.
And finally there is Statue of Founder which is North from Playground and 1 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Library to Statue of Founder following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Library, go 4km West to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 4km South to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km East to Museum.
From Museum, go 2km East to Playground.
From Playground, go 1km North to Statue of Founder.
